title: BRIEF-Petra Diamonds' Qtrly Revenue Down 23% At $61.6 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Petra Diamonds' Qtrly Revenue Down 23% At $61.6 Mln

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 08:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Petra Diamonds' Qtrly Revenue Down 23% At $61.6 Mln Oct 21 (Reuters) - Petra Diamonds Ltd : * Q1 REVENUE FELL 23 PERCENT TO 61.6 MILLION USD * Q1 PRODUCTION UP 1% TO 1,082,764 CARATS (Q1 FY 2019: 1,068,140 CARATS) * Q1 REVENUE DOWN 23% TO $61.6 MILLION FROM 603,626 CARATS SOLD (Q1 FY 2019: $80.2 MILLION FROM 626,541 CARATS SOLD) * DIAMOND PRICES FOR Q1 FY 2020 ON A LIKE-FOR-LIKE BASIS DECREASED CA. 4% IN COMPARISON TO Q4 FY 2019 * NET DEBT AT 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 OF US$592.8 MILLION (30 JUNE 2019: US$564.8 MILLION) * IMPLEMENTATION OF PROJECT 2022 IS NOW UNDER WAY, TARGETING US$150 - 200 MILLION FREE CASHFLOW OVER NEXT THREE YEARS
